author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: This Stranger Things Cover Reveals Eleven's Surprising New Hairstyle
text:
The recently released teaser trailer for season two of Stranger Things has left most fans with more questions than answers â€” but luckily for Netflix lovers everywhere, this week's cover of Entertainment Weekly has revealed a detail the teaser did not.
Hold on to your Eggos! ðŸ˜±ðŸ™Œ Your exclusive first look at season 2 of @StrangerThingsTV has officially arrived. ðŸŽ‰ We have all the intel on what's in store for your favorite kids from Hawkinsâ€”no mouthbreathers allowed! ðŸ˜‚ Click the link in our bio to get all the details and be sure to pick up an issue on newsstands February 10! #StrangerThings #Netflix #WorldUpsideDown #UpsideDown ðŸ“·: @danwintersphoto for EW

Gracing the cover for their Feb. 17 issue is Dustin, Lucas, Will, Mike, and an almost unrecognizable Eleven. That's right, y'all: Eleven's iconic shaved head has been replaced with a gorgeous curly mop â€” which likely means we're about to get introduced to a side of Millie Bobby Brown's character we haven't yet seen.
Season two of Stranger Things premieres this Halloween on Netflix.
Follow Gina on Twitter .
